prompts.registerSuccessInfo1: Click on Book An Appointment button to book one now or come back later.
prompts.registerSuccessInfo2: Your password will be required if you choose to book later.
prompts.registerErrorInfo1: Something went wrong with your registration. Please refresh and try again
prompts.bookSuccessInfo1: Please remember to follow social distancing rules when you come in for testing
prompts.bookSuccessInfo2: If unable to attend cancel immediately to make slots available for others.

team.title: Covid-19 Testing | Team
team.bannerSubtitle: ...more information about the guys behind this project

member1.name: Israel
details: Lead the design approach by adopting best practices with accessibilty as a backdrop
Helped with HTML and CSS, coloring, and layout of the whole page, along side with some simple Javascript work.

member2.name: Owusu
details: Responsible for translating wireframes into fully functional web application.
Using Express.Js I set up a backend server which serves static HTML files on the 'home', 'team' and 'news' routes.
I then adopted CSS and Boostrap to style the front end of the application
All of this was then brought together to be dynamic and interactive using Vanilla JS and jQuery.

member3.name: Elwyn
details: Coordinated with the developer and designer to ensure the application met usability and design standards.
Assisted in creating Back end of the server and also assisted with some difficult parts of CSS and configs.
